titleStmt.title: A musicall dreame. Or The fourth booke of ayres the first part is for the lute, two voyces, and the viole de gambo; the second part is for the lute, the viole and foure voices to sing: the third part is for one voyce alone, or to the lute, the basse viole, or to both if you please, vvhereof, two are Italian ayres. Composed by Robert Iones.
titleStmt.author: Jones, Robert, fl. 1597-1615.

titleStmt.title: A musicall dreame. Or The fourth booke of ayres the first part is for the lute, two voyces, and the viole de gambo; the second part is for the lute, the viole and foure voices to sing: the third part is for one voyce alone, or to the lute, the basse viole, or to both if you please, vvhereof, two are Italian ayres. Composed by Robert Iones.
titleStmt.author: Jones, Robert, fl. 1597-1615.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Iohn Windet, and are to be solde by Simon Waterson, in Powles Church-yeard, at the signe of :he [sic] Crowne,

notesStmt.note: First three words of title are xylographic.
A variant of the edition with "imprinted by the assignes of William Barley" in imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
